Comments.Message: Thanks for the report, this is now fixed.

Hi, I am using Visual Studio 2013 update 4 with TypeScript 1.3, however the additional overload (accepting a form) doesn't be available. 

Q1) As of which version should it be in? 
Q2) It it possible to add it myself for now (I tried editing the lib.d.ts with admin rights) now it pops up in Intellisense, however it doesn't compile.

Thanks in advance!

Regards,
Robert
